title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 200.7 - Location of offices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 200.7 - Location of offices

State Regulations
(a) The principal
office of the State Cemetery Board is located at 123 William Street, New York, NY 10038-3804. (b) All
communications, papers, maps or copies thereof, reports or documents shall be
addressed to or filed in the principal office of the State Cemetery Board
unless otherwise directed by the division. (c) Orders by the State Cemetery Board may be
filed in its principal office or its Albany, New York branch. (d) There are branch offices at One Commerce

Plaza, 99 Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12231-0001; State Office Building, 207

Genesee Street, Utica, NY 13501-3744; Hughes State Office Building, 333 E. Washington Street, Syracuse, NY 13202-1418; 44 Hawley Street, Binghamton NY
13901 and 65 Court Street, Buffalo, NY 14202-3471. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
200.7

Renumbered
from 200.6

New

York State Register March 9, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 10, eff. 3/9/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
